messages.content:
This General Election will be a big moment for our country.
Over the last decade we’ve seen the country go in the wrong direction: there have been too many cutbacks in essential public services and too many people dependant on food banks to get by. Brexit would only make things worse, and I'm committed to campaigning for 'remain' in a future vote on a Brexit deal – which only a Labour government can guarantee.
Voting Tory or Lib Dem is a vote for more of the same. Labour offers this country the change it needs.
A Labour government will deliver:
• A Final Say vote on the Brexit deal. Only a vote for Labour can guarantee this.
• Housing for all - 1 million new houses and more protection for renters
• A Green Industrial Revolution- investment in new green industries to create thousands of high-skilled jobs and help stop climate change
• Public safety – Gtr M/cr Police have lost 2000 officers since 2010. Labour will reverse these cuts.
• Protect our NHS – The proper investment our health service needs, and we’ll stop any Trump style trade deal that sells off our services.

community.content: Housing for all - 1 million new houses and more protection for renters

leaflet.personalStatement: It’s been an honour to represent my home community as your MP since 2015, and to help thousands of constituents with problems and queries. But we need a Labour government to invest in the future for everyone, so I’m asking for your support on December 12th so we can rebuild Britain for the many not just the few.
